title: Schema-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Project: Applying a Systematic Instructional Design Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematics concepts (functions, equations, geometry)
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environments using digital tools, supporting self-directed learning.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze complex math problems and develop solution strategies by applying schema theory
Learners can construct and apply cognitive schemas in real-world math problem situations through project-based tasks
Learners can validate and refine schemas acquired through peer and self-assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
